original_text: Levites worked along the next part of the wall. Bani's son, Rehum, worked there. Hashabiah repaired the next part of the wall. He ruled over part of the region of Keilah. He did the work on behalf of that region.
korean_text: 그 다음은 레위 사람 바니의 아들 르훔이 중수하였고 그 다음은 그일라 지방 절반을 다스리는 하사뱌가 그 지방을 대표하여 중수하였고

sentences.original_text: Levites worked along the next part of the wall.
Hashabiah repaired the next part of the wall.
He ruled over part of the region of Keilah.
He did the work on behalf of that region.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 지역을 대신하여 일을 했습니다.
